intro: ^! There you are! I’ve been meaning to thank you for your help this week. You’re a real one.”

s: ^That’s what friends are for! How'd it go, if you don’t mind me asking?

Chat1: ^Rashad?Smiling "I appreciate you. At first, I was uneasy about the idea of therapy, but I’m feeling good about my upcoming intake interview."
^Rashad?Smiling "Your help, combined with my doctor's advice, gave me the push I needed. Also, I was thinking about talking to HR about how the board has been treating me."

s: ^Wow, Rashad. How can I support you?
^I’m proud of you, Rashad. I’m sorry you have to deal with this.

Chat2: ^Rashad?Smiling "It’s all good. I plan on asking one of my allies on the board to support me. If this behavior continues, I'm ready to take this to HR."
^Rashad?Smiling "On a lighter note, the board approved an initiative I wanted to talk to you about. You’re always making sure everyone in Bloomwood has the right support and connections."
QuestIntro: ^Rashad?Neutral "When I pitched the initiative to the board, I highlighted the shifting demographics - in short, I want to hold space at the library for an intergenerational dialogue. "
^Rashad?Neutral "The library is like a second home to our seniors and young people, and I'd like to bring them together.”

s: ^An intergenerational dialogue? How would that work?
^That sounds fantastic! How can I help?

QuestDetails1: ^Rashad?Neutral "Hear me out…Remember how we used to help out when Bloomwood Mutual Aid was a thing? Back when Lila's uncle coordinated things to take care of the elders in the community?"
^Rashad?Neutral "Making sure their lawn got mowed, and just checking in? I pitched a program that's just like that."

^Rashad?Neutral "Here's a real specific example - many seniors struggle to use apps for medical care and appointments. I was thinking we could pair teens and seniors to overcome some of those tech roadblocks"

s: ^Wow, I bet the teens get to pick up some pretty cool skills.
^That’s awesome. Can I help with anything?

OptionalQuestDetails1: ^Rashad?Neutral "We can send out a survey to match them up based on their interests and what they’re looking to learn."

s: ^That’s a great idea! So what can I do to help?

QuestDetails2: ^Rashad?Neutral "There's a lot they can learn from each other, and we can offer this as a volunteer opportunity.
^Rashad?Neutral "It looks good on a college application, and it allows seniors to socialize with 'the youth.'"

s: ^It looks good on a resume but even better on the community. Everyone wins!
^Sounds like a win-win situation! How can I help?

OptionalQuestDetails2: ^Rashad?Neutral "It would be a mutually beneficial relationship."
^Rashad?Neutral "Teens could help seniors decipher their health needs, and seniors can share their life-long lessons with their mentees. What do you think?"

s: ^I have a great feeling about this program. How can I help?
^This program is gonna be epic! What can I do to help?

QuestAcceptance: ^Rashad?Smiling "Now that I think about it, I do have something you can do."
^Rashad?Smiling "Before I create a survey, I need to know a bit more about what teens and seniors could learn from each other. I definitely want to get some input before we roll out the program."
^Rashad?Smiling "Maybe find out more about what our elders might benefit from and what teens feel like they need or want to learn?"

s: ^Sure! I know exactly who to ask about this.

Goodbye: ^! Thanks for all your help with this, I knew I could count on you."
^Rashad?Smiling "I feel like my vision for the library is coming together. Take care, okay?"

s: ^Take care Rashad! I'm so excited for you.
